title: The Three Little Pigs
short_plot_summary: Three little pigs each build their own houses with different materials. A big bad wolf tries to blow their houses down but is only successful with the houses made of straw and sticks. The house made of bricks saves the day.
explanation: Three pigs, representing the main characters of the story
Straw, symbolizing the material used for the first pig's house
Wood, representing the material used for the second pig's house
Bricks, signifying the strong material used for the third pig's house
A wolf, depicting the antagonist who tries to blow the pigs' houses down
